case.title: SEEKING YOUNG CUTIE 18-25 LOOKING FOR A DADDY FIGURE - 46 (Suffolk, Long Island)
case.text: IF YOU ARE LOOKING FOR A DADDY FIGURE, MENTOR, OLDER MASCULINE LOVER, FOR NURTURING AND GUIDANCE AND YOU ARE CARING, AFFECTIONATE, THIN TO AVERAGE, AND HAVE A STRONG NEED TO BE WITH DADDY THEN WRITE BACK AND SEND A PIC. DADDY COULD BE GENEROUS WITH THE RIGHT GIRL..WRITE (DADDY'S GIRL) IN THE SUBJECT SO I KNOW ITS NOT SPAM..SERIOUS ONLY..PREFER SUFFOLK COUNTY, NO GAMES OR ENDLESS EMAILS..
